mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Frazier, James to Wheat, James S.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Frazier, James
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Adj't Genl. Wheat Wheeling July 20 1861. By Telegraph, from Clarksburg 20 1861. There is a part of a cavalry company here and they want to be mustered into the service & want forage for their horses must I give it to them? Jas Frazier Col 4th Va. V. 31 D 98 pd [page 2] Jas Frazier Clarksburg July 19
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Frazier, James
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wheat, James S.
